projectOne.name: Ecommerce
projectOne.description: An e-commerce platform developed with Docker, Nginx, Nuxt, and Strapi. Includes email notifications, Stripe payments integration, and automated invoice generation.

projectTwo.name: Musapp
projectTwo.description: A music application that allows users to play a virtual piano and playback MIDI files uploaded to the API. Features random melody generation capabilities.

projectThree.name: Hispano
projectThree.description: Transpiler that converts Spanish-language code keywords into Rust's English equivalents, enabling code writing in Spanish.

notFound.seoDescription: The page you are looking for is not available. Go back to the main page to explore the content.

home.seoDescription: Welcome to my portfolio. Discover my skills, experience, and featured projects.

about.seoDescription: Learn more about me, my experience, skills, and professional background.

profile.subtitle: Web Developer
profile.aboutTextPart3: My goal has always been to combine creativity with technology to solve real problems and deliver effective solutions for both frontend and backend.
profile.description: I am a developer passionate about creating modern and functional applications, with experience in both frontend and backend technologies. I’ve been interested in programming for a long time, so I completed a short bootcamp. Afterward, since I didn’t feel fully prepared, I continued studying independently. I learned Python and some Rust. I am eager to work as a programmer and am proficient across the entire stack, both frontend and backend. On the frontend, my favorite technologies are React and Vue. For the backend, I prefer Next.js for its structure and Fastify for its performance.

contact.thanks: Thank you for visiting my page!
